PRIVACY_title: プライバシー保護に関する方針
PRIVACY_button: プライバシー保護に関する方針
TERMS_content:
THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS (“TERMS”) APPLY TO YOUR USE OF THE “SYMBOL
WALLET” (MORE PARTICULARLY DESCRIBED BELOW) PROVIDED BY NEM SOFTWARE
LIMITED.
BY USING THE SYMBOL WALLET, YOU WILL BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS WHICH ARE A
BINDING CONTRACT BETWEEN YOU AND NEM SOFTWWARE LIMITED.
PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY AND NOTE THAT THE SECTION ON DISPUTE
RESOLUTION CONTAINS A BINDING JURISDICTION CLAUSE WHICH AFFECTS YOUR
LEGAL RIGHTS. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THESE TERMS, DO NOT USE THE SYMBOL
WALLET.
YOU AND THE COMPANY HEREBY AGREE AS FOLLOWS:
1. Parties to these Terms
1.1 NEM SOFTWARE LIMITED, a company incorporated and registered in Gibraltar under
number 119521 and with its registered address at Suite 7, Hadfield House, Library Street,
Gibraltar, GX11 1AA (“Company”, “we”, “us” or “our” as the context may require) and its
successors in interests and assigns.
1.2 The natural or legal person who/which accepts these Terms and agrees to use the Symbol
Wallet (as defined below) as set out in these Terms (“you” or “your” as the context may
require).
In these Terms, you and the Company are hereinafter collectively referred to as the “Parties” and
each individually as a “Party” as the context may require.
If you have any questions relating to these Terms, please contact us at
symbolterms@nem.software.
2. The Symbol Wallet
2.1 Version 1 of the NEM blockchain and the XEM token was launched in March 2015. Since
that time, the NEM community has determined that it would be desirable to develop a new
blockchain, which has now been developed (the “Symbol Blockchain”). The Symbol
Blockchain is expected to be launched in early 2021 along with the new XYM token which
will be its native currency (“XYM”).
2.2 The application known as the Symbol Wallet is a piece of software offered by the Company
connecting and interacting with the Symbol Blockchain (the “Symbol Wallet”), which allows
its users to access a range of services including (but not limited to) creating, issuing, signing
and viewing transactions and associated data on the Symbol Blockchain (the “Services”).
2.3 The Symbol Wallet consists of:
(a) various pieces of open source code (the “Open Source Code”) committed to the Open
Source Github repositories for the Symbol Blockchain, licensed under and governed by
Version 2.0 of the Apache License which can be viewed at
https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 (the “Apache License”); and
(b) other pieces of code produced by the Company which are its sole and exclusive property
(the “Proprietary Code”). 
The Open Source Code and of the Proprietary Code have been combined by us in a
particular manner (the “Combination Structure”) in order to create the Symbol Wallet.
2.4 A desktop version of the Symbol Wallet is available to download from the our website:
https://symbolplatform.com (the “Website”) or from any other website which we have
provided a link to on the Website (. Mobile versions of the Symbol Wallet are available to be
downloaded from various app stores for mobile devices. The Website, the said other
websites linked =thereto from which the Symbol Wallet can be downloaded and the said app
stores for mobile devices shall collectively be referred to as a “Download Source”.
2.5 The Symbol Wallet is not an account whereby the Company or other third parties act as
financial intermediaries or safekeepers of XYM or other data such as mosaics (collectively,
the “Wallet Assets”). The Company acts as a software provider only and does not operate
as a crypto-exchange, a place for buying or selling Wallet Assets, a place to store Wallet
Assets, a custodian of Wallet Assets, a payment service provider, an e-money institution and
does not provide customer accounts. The Symbol Wallet solely enables its user to access
their electronic wallet via mobile telephone or other mobile or desktop device.
2.6 We do not have any control over goods and services which are paid for using the Symbol
Wallet, we do not accept any liability for this and we are not responsible for the successful
completion of business transactions between buyers and sellers.
2.7 The Company cannot retrieve your private codes or passwords if you have lost them or
forgotten them and it cannot guarantee a transaction confirmation because we do not have
any control over the user's Symbol Wallet.
2.8 Updates. The Symbol Wallet and the Services are evolving and you may be required to
accept or install updates in this regard or update third party software (that is, browsers or
operating systems) in order to keep using the Symbol Wallet or access its latest features,
including security updates. We may update or make changes to the Symbol Wallet and/or
the Services at any time without providing prior notice to you.
2.9 The terms and conditions of the app store from which a Symbol Wallet may be downloaded,
must be observed in addition to these Terms.
3. Personal data
The Company does not require you to provide us with any item of your personal data and,
as such, we do not obtain, process or store your personal data. None of the Services require
you to provide your personal data and, to the extent that you may do so, such data would be
stored or processed by you locally on your desktop and/or mobile device and not by us.
4. The Open Source Software & Grant of licence
4.1 The use, licensing and redistribution of the Open Source Software is governed by the Apache
License. The grant of the License by the Company set out in clause 4.3 below shall be
subject to the terms of the Apache License and shall not restrict the use, licensing and
redistribution of the Open Source Software.
4.2 All Intellectual Property Rights (as defined below) associated with the Proprietary Code and
the Combination Structure (the “Company IP”), are the sole and exclusive property of the
Company.
4.3 Subject to clause 4.1, with effect from the moment you successfully download a Symbol
Wallet from a Download Source and subject to these Terms, the Company hereby grants
you a revocable, non-exclusive, non-sublicensable, non-transferrable, free and limited
licence for your use of the Symbol Wallet (including all updates, upgrades, new versions and
replacement code or software).
5. Use of the Symbol Wallet
5.1 In these Terms, the term “use of the Symbol Wallet” and “using the Symbol Wallet” shall
be understood to include the use of the Services.
5.2 Use of the Symbol Wallet is restricted to persons over 18 years of age.
5.3 The Symbol Wallet application must be downloaded and saved to your mobile or desktop
device in order to use the same.
5.4 Certain Restrictions. By using the Symbol Wallet, you agree not to:
(a) license, sell, rent, lease, transfer, assign, reproduce, distribute, host or otherwise
commercially exploit the Company IP or any part thereof in any manner whatsoever;
(b) use any metatags or other “hidden text” using the Company’s name or that of any of
its associated companies (including but not limited to NEM Group Limited and Symbol
Chain Limited) names or trademarks;
(c) modify, translate, adapt, merge, make derivative works of, disassemble, decompile,
reverse compile or reverse engineer any part of the Company IP;
(d) access the Company IP in order to build a similar or competitive wallet, services,
software or website;
(e) copy, reproduce, distribute, republish, download, display, post or transmit any
Company IP except as expressly permitted herein; and
(f) remove or destroy any copyright notices or other proprietary markings contained on or
in the Company IP.
5.5 Third-Party Services. The Symbol Wallet may incorporate or may provide access to,
applications or materials that are hosted by third parties, including:
(a) Wallet Assets;
(b) cryptocurrency exchanges;
(c) cryptocurrency value information services; and
(d) other third party services;
(collectively, the “Third Party Services”).
You acknowledge and agree that all cryptocurrency exchanges which you have access to
via the Symbol Wallet are controlled and operated by third parties and that we do not directly
exchange virtual currencies and have no role whatsoever in this regard. Access to Third
Party Services may be geoblocked for residents of certain countries. You acknowledge and
agree that it is impossible for us to monitor Third Party Services and the providers of the
same and that you access such Third Party Services entirely at your own risk. You should
not share any credential, private key or any other sensitive information relating to your
Symbol Wallet or your use of the Symbol Wallet with any third party without first satisfying
yourself as to their legitimacy. Third Party Services are provided to you, subject to the terms
and conditions of the providers of such services and we have no responsibility, obligations
or liabilities whatsoever in this regard. To the extent Third Party Services are incorporated
into or linked to or from the Symbol Wallet which have terms and conditions that differ from
these Terms, you may be required to agree to such terms in order to access the Third Party
Service. We do not control the terms, policies, or performance of any third party and are not
responsible for any performance or provision, or the failure to perform or provide, any Third
Party Services including, but not limited to, with respect to exchange rates, processing of
transactions, and similar activities.
5.6 Intellectual property. You acknowledge and agree that all Intellectual Property Rights (as
defined below) associated with the Company IP are the sole and exclusive property of the
Company. These Terms do not grant you any rights to, or in, patents, copyrights, database
rights, trade secrets, trade names, trademarks (whether registered or unregistered), or any
other rights or licences in respect of the Company IP. In this clause 5.6, “Intellectual
Property Rights” means, as regards the Company IP: patents, supplementary protection
certificates, petty patents, utility models, trademarks, copyright and related rights, moral
rights, trade-marks, trade names, service marks, rights in get-up, rights in trade dress, rights
in goodwill or to sue for passing off or for unfair competition, rights in designs, rights in
computer software, database rights, rights to use, rights in designs, copyrights and
topography rights, rights to all inventions, know-how, trade secrets, techniques, rights to
confidential information, confidential information, other proprietary knowledge and
information, all rights and forms of protection of a similar nature or having equivalent or
similar effect to any of these and any other intellectual property rights of whatsoever nature
and all similar or equivalent rights or forms of protection which may now or in the future
subsist in any part of the world in each case whether registered or unregistered and including
all applications and rights to apply for and be granted any such rights, renewals or extensions
thereof and rights to claim priority from.
6. Fees
Use of the Symbol Wallet is free of charge. However, your interactions with the Symbol
Blockchain and with Third Party Services may incur various fees which are not under our
control. Any such fees are not charged by or payable to the Company.
7. Your representations and warranties
7.1 By using the Symbol Wallet, you hereby represent and warrant the matters set out in
Schedule 1 of these Terms.
7.2 You undertake and agree to notify the Company immediately if any of the representations
and warranties set out in Schedule 1 of these Terms becomes untrue, incomplete, invalid or
misleading in any respect.
7.3 If you cannot make all of the representations and warranties set out in Schedule 1 of these
Terms, you must not use the Symbol Wallet.
8. Risks
8.1 You acknowledge and agree that using the Symbol Wallet may carry significant financial,
regulatory and reputational risks, including but not limited to those set out in Schedule 2 of
these Terms.
8.2 By using the Symbol Wallet and accepting these Terms, you expressly and finally
acknowledge, accept and assume the risks set out in Schedule 2 of these Terms and
acknowledge, accept and assume that such risks are not nor are they intended to be a
comprehensive or exhaustive list of risk factors.
9. Security
9.1 The Symbol Wallet is locally installed on your desktop and/or mobile device and you are
entirely responsible for the security of the device on which it is installed including ensuring
that you keep anti-virus software current and otherwise protect such device against malware.
9.2 You are responsible for implementing all reasonable and appropriate measures for securing
your Symbol Wallet, including any requisite private key(s) or other credentials necessary to
access such storage mechanism(s). If your private key(s) or other access credentials are
lost, you may lose access to your Wallet Assets and/or other data. The Company is not
responsible for any security measures relating to your receipt, possession, storage, transfer
or potential future use of Wallet Assets and of the Symbol Blockchain via your Symbol Wallet
nor will we be under any obligation to recover or return any Wallet Assets and/or other data.
9.3 The Company excludes (to the fullest extent permitted under applicable law) any and all
liability for any security breaches or other acts or omissions which result in your loss of
(including your loss of access to) Wallet Assets and/or other data stored by you in your
Symbol Wallet.
10. Indemnity
10.1 To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, you will indemnify, defend and hold
harmless the Company and our respective past, present and future employees, officers,
directors, contractors, consultants, equity holders, suppliers, vendors, service providers,
parent companies, subsidiaries, associates, affiliates, agents, representatives,
predecessors, successors and assigns, specifically including but not limited to NEM Group
Limited, Symbol Chain Limited and the NEM Group Trust (and its trustees) and any other
party who has committed code to the Open Source Github repositories for the Symbol
Blockchain (the “Company Indemnified Parties”) from and against any and all claims,
demands, actions, damages, losses, costs and expenses (including reasonable professional
and legal fees) that arise from or relate to:
(a) your use of the Symbol Wallet and/or use of Wallet Assets and/or use of the Symbol
Blockchain under these Terms;
(b) the performance or non-performance of your responsibilities, representations,
warranties or obligations under these Terms;
(c) your breach of any of the terms and conditions set out in these Terms; or
(d) your breach of any rights of any other person or entity in connection with these Terms.
10.2 The Company reserves the right to exercise sole control over the defence, at your sole cost
and expense, of any claim subject to an indemnity set out in clause 10.1.
10.3 The indemnity set out in this clause 10 is in addition to, and not in lieu of, any other remedies
that may be available to the Company under any applicable law.
11. Disclaimers
11.1 To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and except as otherwise specified in writing
by us:
(a) Use of the Symbol Wallet is offered without any warranties or representations of any
kind, and we expressly disclaim all warranties and representations relating to the
Symbol Wallet (whether express or implied), including, without limitation, any implied
warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title and noninfringement;
(b) we do not represent or warrant that the Symbol Wallet is reliable, current or defectfree, meet your requirements, or that any defects will be corrected; and
(c) we cannot and do not represent or warrant that the Symbol Wallet is free of viruses or
other harmful components.
11.2 No regulatory authority has examined or approved any of the information set out in these
Terms or in the Symbol Wallet. No such action has been or will be taken under the laws,
regulatory requirements or rules of any jurisdiction. The publication, distribution or
dissemination of these Terms and of the Symbol Wallet does not imply that applicable laws,
regulatory requirements or rules have been complied with.
12. Limitation of liability
12.1 To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, in no circumstances will: 
(a) the Company or any of the Company Indemnified Parties be liable for any direct,
indirect, special, incidental or consequential loss of any kind (including, but not limited
to, loss of revenue, income, business or profits, loss of contract or depletion of goodwill,
loss of anticipated savings, loss of use or data, or damages for business interruption
or any like loss) arising out of or in any way related to your use of the Symbol Wallet
or otherwise related to these Terms, regardless of the cause of action, whether based
in contract, tort (including negligence), breach of statutory duty, restitution or any other
legal or equitable basis (even if the Company or any of the Company Indemnified
Parties have been advised of the possibility of such losses and regardless of whether
such losses were foreseeable); and
(b) the aggregate liability of the Company and the Company Indemnified Parties (jointly),
whether in contract, tort (including negligence), breach of statutory duty, restitution or
any other legal or equitable basis, arising out of or relating to these Terms or the use
of or inability to use your Symbol Wallet, exceed £1.
12.2 The limitations and exclusions of liability set out in clause 12.1 do not limit or exclude liability
for fraud or intentional, wilful or reckless misconduct of any Company Indemnified Party, nor
will it limit or exclude any losses for which, as a matter of applicable law, it would be unlawful
to limit or exclude liability.
13. Assignment and novation
13.1 The Company may assign, transfer, novate or otherwise deal in any manner, all or any part
of the benefit of these Terms and any of its rights, remedies, powers, duties and obligations
under these Terms to any person, without your consent and in any way the Company
considers appropriate.
13.2 You agree that you may not claim against any assignee, transferee or any other person who
has an interest in these Terms, any right of set off or other rights that you have against the
Company.
14. Termination
14.1 Notwithstanding any other provision of these Terms, the Company may at any time and for
any reason immediately terminate these Terms as between you and it without prior notice or
need to specify reasons, including if:
(a) you have breached any provision of these Terms or acted in a manner which clearly
shows that you do not intend to or are unable to comply with any provision in these
Terms;
(b) the Company reasonably considers it is required to do so by the application of any laws
or regulations or by any government, quasi-government, authority or public body
(including any regulatory body of any jurisdiction); or
(c) the Company determines that performing its obligations under these Terms is no
longer commercially viable.
15. Survival
The following clauses survive termination of these Terms and remain binding and effective
(a) this clause 15;
(b) clause 7 (your representations and warranties);
(c) clause 10 (Indemnity);
(d) clause 12 (Limitation of liability);
(e) clause 16 (Waiver of set-off); and
(f) clause 18 (Dispute resolution).
15.1 Waiver of set-off
15.2 You acknowledge and agree unconditionally and irrevocably to waive any right of set-off,
netting, counterclaim, abatement or other similar remedy which you might otherwise have in
respect of the Symbol Wallet or under these Terms under the laws of any jurisdiction.
16. Taxation
16.1 You are solely responsible for determining whether your use of the Symbol Wallet will give
rise to any tax implications on your part.
16.2 You are solely responsible for withholding, collecting, reporting, paying, settling and/or
remitting any and all taxes to the appropriate tax authorities in such jurisdiction(s) in which
you may be liable to pay tax. The Company is not responsible for withholding, collecting,
reporting, paying, settling and/or remitting any taxes (including, but not limited to, any income,
capital gains, sales, value added or similar tax) which may arise from your use of the Symbol
Wallet under or in connection with these Terms.
16.3 You agree not to hold the Company or any of the Company Indemnified Parties liable for any
tax liability associated with or arising from your use of the Symbol Wallet.
17. Dispute resolution
17.1 Governing Law. These Terms and any dispute or claim (including non-contractual disputes
or claims) arising out of or in connection with it or its subject matter or formation shall be
governed by and construed in accordance with the law of Gibraltar.
17.2 Exclusive Jurisdiction. Each party irrevocably agrees that the courts of Gibraltar shall have
exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute or claim (including non-contractual disputes or
claims) arising out of or in connection with these Terms or their subject matter or formation.
17.3 No Class Arbitrations, Class Actions or Representative Actions. Any dispute arising out
of or related to these Terms is personal to you and the Company and will be resolved solely
in accordance with clause 17.2, and will not be brought as a class arbitration, class action or
any other type of representative proceeding. There will be no class arbitration or arbitration
in which an individual attempts to resolve a dispute as a representative of another individual
or group of individuals. Further, a dispute cannot be brought as a class or other type of
representative action, whether within or outside of arbitration, or on behalf of any other
individual or group of individuals.
17.4 Severability of Dispute Resolution Provisions. If any term, clause or provision of this
clause 17 is held invalid or unenforceable, it will be so held to the minimum extent applicable
and required by law, and all other terms, clauses and provisions of this clause 17 will remain
valid and enforceable. Further, the waivers set out in clause 17.3 above are severable from
the other provisions of these Terms and will remain valid and enforceable, except as
prohibited by applicable law.
18. Miscellaneous
18.1 We may amend these Terms from time to time (including, but not limited to, changes to the
Services), to make any essential corrections, or as may be otherwise required by any laws
or regulatory requirements to which we are subject. If we make any amendments to these
Terms, we will publish a notice together with the updated Terms on the Website and we will
change the “Version” number at the top of these Terms. Any amended Terms becomes
effective immediately upon the publication of notice and updated Terms on the Website. It is
your responsibility to regularly check the Website for any such notices and updated Terms.
18.2 If any term, clause or provision of these Terms is found to be illegal, void or unenforceable
(in whole or in part), then such term, clause or provision will be severable from these Terms
without affecting the validity or enforceability of any remaining part of that term, clause or
provision, or any other term, clause or provision of these Terms, which remains in full force
and effect. 
18.3 These Terms constitute the entire agreement between the Parties in relation to its subject
matter. These Terms replace and extinguish any and all prior agreements, draft agreements,
arrangements, warranties, statements, assurances, representations and undertakings of any
nature made by, or on behalf of the Parties, whether oral or written, public or private, in
relation to that subject matter.
18.4 You acknowledge that by accepting these Terms, you have not relied on any oral or written
statements, warranties, assurances, representations or undertakings which were or may
have been made by or on behalf of the Company, or by any other third party, in relation to
the subject matter of these Terms at any time before your acceptance of them (“PreContractual Statements”), other than those set out in these Terms. You hereby waive any
and all rights and remedies which might otherwise be available in relation to such PreContractual Statements.
18.5 Nothing in these Terms creates any form of partnership, joint venture or any other similar
relationship between you and the Company and/or other individuals or entities involved with
the Symbol Wallet.
18.6 You acknowledge and agree that no other person who uses a Symbol Wallet owes you any
obligation under these Terms.
18.7 Any indemnity, reimbursement or similar obligation in these Terms given in favour of the
Company:
(a) is a continuing obligation despite the satisfaction of any payment or other obligation in
connection with this document, any settlement or any other thing; and
(b) is independent of any other obligations under these Terms and continues after
termination of them. It is not necessary for the Company to incur any expense or make
payment before enforcing a right of indemnity in connection with the subject of these
Terms.
18.8 Without limiting any other disclaimer in these Terms or elsewhere, the Company is not liable
for any loss, liability, costs or expenses arising in connection with the exercise or attempted
exercise of, failure to exercise, or delay in exercising, a right, power or remedy in connection
with these Terms.
18.9 These Terms do not give rise to any rights for a third party to enforce any term of these
Terms. The rights of the Parties to rescind or agree any amendment or waiver under these
Terms are not subject to the consent of any other person.
18.10 Force Majeure. The Parties shall not be liable for any failure or delay in performing any of
their respective obligations under or pursuant to this Agreement, and any such failure or
delay in performing its obligations will not constitute a breach of this Agreement, if such failure
or delay is due to an ‘Act of God’, any change to the law, order or regulation of a
governmental, supranational or regulatory body or any act of war or terrorism and it shall be
entitled to a reasonable extension of the time for performance of such obligations as a result
of such a cause.
19. Interpretation
(a) In these Terms, unless the context otherwise requires, words importing the singular
shall be deemed to include the plural and vice versa, words importing the masculine
gender shall include the feminine gender also and vice-versa, words importing the
neuter gender shall include the masculine and feminine gender also and vice-versa.
(b) Unless stated otherwise, references to an “Act” is a reference to a Gibraltar Act of
Parliament (as may be amended from time to time).
(c) References in these Terms to any statute or any statutory provision shall include any
statute or statutory provision which now or at any time in the future, amends, extends,
consolidates or replaces the same or which has been amended, extended, 
consolidated or replaced by the same and shall include any orders, regulations,
instruments or other subordinate legislation made under the relevant statute.
(d) The Schedules form part of these Terms and shall have effect as if set out in full in the
body of these Terms. Any reference to these Terms includes the Schedules.
(e) References in these Terms to any instrument or agreement shall include any
instrument or agreement which at the date of these Terms varies, amends, extends or
replaces the same.
(f) Any words following the terms “including”, “include”, “in particular” or any similar
expression shall be construed as illustrative and shall not limit the sense of the words
preceding those terms.
(g) A reference to any Party shall include that Party's personal representatives,
successors, permitted transferees and permitted assigns and all references to a legal
entity shall include their successors in interest, permitted transferees and permitted
assigns.
(h) References to "persons" includes natural persons, firms, partnerships, companies,
corporations, associations, organisations, governments, states, governmental or state
agencies, foundations and trusts (in each case whether or not incorporated or having
separate legal personality and irrespective of the jurisdiction in or under the law of
which it was incorporated or exists).

INTRO_slideOne.title: Symbolへようこそ
INTRO_slideOne.text: NEMからお届けする次世代ブロックチェーン。

INTRO_slideTwo.title: XYMを始める
INTRO_slideTwo.text: このアプリでSymbolネットワークのローンチにオプトインする方法について詳しくは、nemplatform.com/symbol-migration でご覧ください。

INTRO_slideThree.title: スマートブロックチェーンについて
INTRO_slideThree.text: Symbolプラグインを有効化したスマートコントラクトとアーキテクチャで、最も安定した安全なブロックチェーンを実現します。

INTRO_alreadyHaveWallet: すでにSymbolウォレットをお持ちですか？
IMPORT_WALLET_OPTIONS_title: ウォレットのインポート
IMPORT_WALLET_OPTIONS_content: Symbolウォレットをインポートするには、24語のパスフレーズ（ニーモニック）を入力するか、QRコードをスキャンします。どちらかを選択してください。
IMPORT_WALLET_OPTIONS_button_mnemonics: ニーモニックで復元する
IMPORT_WALLET_OPTIONS_button_qr: QRコードをスキャンする

EnterMnemonics.title: ウォレットのインポート
EnterMnemonics.content: 正しい順序でニーモニックを入力して、ウォレットをインポートします。

error.invalidMnemonic: ニーモニックが無効です
error.invalidMnemonics: ニーモニックが無効です。

ImportOptions.title: ウォレットのインポート
ImportOptions.buttonTitleRestoreMnemonics: ニーモニックで復元する
ImportOptions.buttonTitleQr: QRコードをスキャンする
ImportOptions.contentPlaceholder: Symbolウォレットをインポートするには、24語のパスフレーズ（ニーモニック）を入力するか、QRコードをスキャンします。どちらかを選択してください。

ShowQRCode.errorTitle: Symbolの有効なQRコードではありません。

GenerateKey.title: 携帯をシェイクしてください！
GenerateKey.description: 携帯をシェイクして、エントロピーを高めましょう

GenerateBackup.title: バックアップの作成
GenerateBackup.description: ウォレットのパスフレーズ（ニーモニック）を書き取って安全な場所に保管すれば、ウォレットのバックアップを作ることができます。それを使えば、ウォレットを再度インポートすることが可能です。ただし、そのパスフレーズにアクセスできるすべての人が、それで作成したアカウント、つまりあなたの資金にアクセスできることになりますので、ご注意ください。あるいは、パスフレーズのQRコードを生成すれば、それでウォレットのバックアップを作ることもできます。
GenerateBackup.mnemonicButton: ニーモニックでバックアップ
GenerateBackup.QRButton: QRコードでバックアップ
GenerateBackup.dashboardButton: バックアップをスキップ

ShowMnemonics.title: ニーモニックフレーズ
ShowMnemonics.description: 24語のパスフレーズ（ニーモニック）をバックアップ用にメモして、安全な場所に保管してください。そうすれば、いつでもウォレットを復元することができます。

SetPassword.title: パスワードの作成
SetPassword.checkboxText: 私は、パスフレーズ（ニーモニック）を暗号化してQRコードを保護するパスワードの使用を希望しません。
SetPassword.alertPasswordConfirmation: パスワードと確認用の入力が一致していません。
SetPassword.errorPasswordTooShort: パスワードには、最低8文字必要です

VerifyMnemonics.title: ニーモニックフレーズ
VerifyMnemonics.description: 正しい順番で単語を選択して、ニーモニックのパスフレーズが正しいことを確認してください。

error.passphraseOrder: 復元用パスフレーズの順番が間違っています。

success.passphraseOrder: 成功しました。次にお進みください。

ShowQRCode.title: ウォレットのバックアップ

About.title: Symbolについて
About.aboutTextPara_1: NEM Group Limitedは、情報技術から起業家、業務プロセス、トレーディング、財産および資産開発、国際経営、学界にわたり、豊富な経験を重ねた人々の世界的なネットワークから支持を受けています。その企業理念は、NEMのブロックチェーン技術プラットフォームの提供を通じて、人による人のためのエンタープライズとして成長を続けることにあります。NEMのチームは、研修イベントやサービスプロバイダー、テクニカルサポートに至るまで、このエコシステムのサポートと教育をさまざまな形で提供しています。
About.aboutTextPara_2: 弊社のユニークな経営アプローチは、すべての企業と地域のあらゆるレベルで進化を続けて影響力を高めるために、明確かつ厳密な進路を定めています。その結果、財団全体にわたる豊かな経験を幅広く集積した国際的な集団の多様性は、弊社の経営陣にも反映されています。
About.urlError: リンクを開くことができません

NodeSwitching.title: お待ちください
NodeSwitching.errorMessage: ノードの切替中にエラーが発生しました

OptIn.DashboardModalTitle: メインネットはまだローンチしていません
OptIn.DashboardModalDescription: このアカウントは、NEM NIS1からの資金をSymbolにオプトインすることができます
OptIn.WelcomeDescription: オプトインの完了により、Symbolパブリック・ブロックチェーンのローンチにご参加いただく意思を表明したものとみなされます。これにより、スナップショット時のXEMアカウント残高と同数のXYM資金をご請求いただけるようになります（NEM NIS1ブロックチェーン上にお持ちのXEM残高は変わりません）。また、NEM NIS1のネームスペースを再度ご登録いただけば（すでにお持ちの場合）、Symbolの最初のブロックから使用を開始することができます。XEMアカウント残高の変更も可能で、お受け取りいただくXYMの数量はスナップショット時の残高により決定されます。
OptIn.StoppedDescription: オプトインが完了しました。アプリを更新して、最新ニュースを受け取りましょう。
OptIn.NoAccountsImported: まだXEMアカウントのインポートが完了していません。開始するには、アカウントをインポートしてください。
OptIn.SelectNISAccount: XEMアカウントを選択してください：
OptIn.MultisigOptIn: マルチシグアカウントのオプトイン
OptIn.CosignMultisigOptIn: マルチシグアカウントのオプトインに連署する
OptIn.ConfigureAccount: オプトインしたいアカウント（複数可）を選択してください
OptIn.EmptyAccountList: インポートしたアカウントがありません。下のボタンで、XEMアカウントをインポートしてください。その後、リストから選択したアカウントをオプトインするか、マルチシグアカウントの場合はオプトインに連署することができます。
OptIn.AccountIsNotOptedIn: このアカウントはまだオプトインされていません！
OptIn.AccountIsOptedIn: このアカウントは正常にオプトインされました。
OptIn.AccountIsNotOptedInList: ボタンを押してオプトインしてください！
OptIn.AccountIsOptedInMultisigList: マルチシグアカウントの連署
OptIn.SelectMultisigAccountTitle: マルチシグXEMアカウントを選択
OptIn.ImportNISAccount: 新しいアカウントのインポート
OptIn.ImportAccountPrivateKey: プライベートキーでアカウントを追加
OptIn.ImportAccountQR: QRコードでアカウントを追加
OptIn.ImportNISPrivateKey: プライベートキーのインポート
OptIn.EnterNISPrivateKey: プライベートキーを入力
OptIn.InvalidPrivateKey: プライベートキーが無効です
OptIn.NoNISAccounts: まだXEMアカウントをインポートしていません
OptIn.ImportQR: QRコードを使用してインポート
OptIn.HowToMultisig: このアカウントは、マルチシグの連署人アカウントです。まず、このアカウント用のオプトインを完了して、マルチシグアカウントのオプトイン連署のロックを解除してください。
OptIn.BalanceWarning: ローンチ時にSymbolアカウントに入る資金は、スナップショット時のブロック上に存在するこのアカウント内の資金のみに限られます。
OptIn.StartOptInDescription: これから始めるのは、マルチシグではなく通常のアカウントのオプトインプロセスです。これを実行すると、対象アカウントにネームスペースをオプトインすることになります。このプロセスは、以下の手順で行います：
OptIn.StartOptInStep1: オプトインするネームスペースを選択する
OptIn.StartOptInStep2: ステップ2：Symbolアカウントを作成する
OptIn.StartOptInStep3: ステップ3：Symbolアカウントをバックアップする
OptIn.StartOptInStepFinal: 最終ステップ：オプトインを再確認して完了する
OptIn.NamespacesOptInTitle: ネームスペースの選択
OptIn.NamespacesOptInDescription: ここでは、NEM NIS1上に所有するネームスペース（複数可）をオプトインすることができます。これにより、Symbolブロックチェーン上に同一のネームスペース（複数可）のプレースホルダーを確保します。ネームスペースを1つ選択するごとに、オプトインプロセスの手数料がかかります。
OptIn.VrfOptInDescription: VRFキーで、ブロックをハーベストして報酬を受けることができます。ローンチ後、アカウントに10,000 XYM以上を保有する予定があり、Symbolブロックチェーンでハーベストを行いたい場合は、VRFキーをオプトインプロセスに追加する必要があります。
OptIn.VrfOptInCheck: ハーベスト用のVRFキーを含める
OptIn.ReviewSymbolAccountTitle: ステップ2：Symbolアカウントの再確認
OptIn.ReviewSymbolAccountDescription: これがあなたのSymbolアカウントです。このアカウントを復元する唯一の方法は、ニーモニックを使うことです。すべて書き取って安全な場所に保管してから、QRコードをバックアップしてください。
OptIn.ReviewSymbolMnemonics: あなたのSymbol用ニーモニック：
OptIn.BackupSymbolAccountTitle: ステップ3：Symbolアカウントのバックアップ
OptIn.NotEnoughBalance: アカウントの残高が足りません
OptIn.FinishOptInDescription: これがオプトイン用の最終データです。注意深く再確認してから、完了を押してプロセスを終了してください。
OptIn.NISAddress: XEMアカウントのアドレス：
OptIn.SymbolAccount: Symbolアカウントのアドレス：
OptIn.NoNamespacesIncluded: ネームスペースが含まれていません
OptIn.Understand1: 私は、オプトインプロセスで使用したニーモニックによるパスフレーズのバックアップを取りました。また、それを保存してバックアップするのは自分の責任だということを理解しました。
OptIn.Understand2: 私は、ローンチ時にSymbolのXYMアカウント残高に入る資金は、スナップショットの時点で自分のXEMアカウントに保有する資金のみだということを理解しました。また、これからスナップショットまでの間に自分のXEMアカウントに変更を加えた場合、Symbolのローンチ時に自分のXYMアカウント残高に反映されることを理解しました。
OptIn.SuccessOptInDescription: このアカウントはオプトインされました！
OptIn.SummaryTitle: オプトインのサマリー
OptIn.SummaryDescription: 通常のオプトインを完了しました。こちらでご確認ください。
OptIn.MultisigOptInDescription: マルチシグアカウントのオプトインは、連署人の一人がNEMデスクトップウォレット（旧名称Nano Wallet）から開始しなければなりません。その後、下のドロップダウンリストにそのアカウントが表示され、オプトインの署名ができるようになります。マルチシグアカウントのオプトインは、連署人全員が署名した時点で完了します。
OptIn.SelectMultisigAccount: オプトインするマルチシグアカウントを選択してください。
OptIn.OptInNotInitiated: このマルチシグアカウントのオプトインは、まだ開始されていません。NEMデスクトップウォレット（旧名称Nano Wallet）を使用して開始してください。
OptIn.CosignOptIn: オプトインに連署する
OptIn.EnterPasswordToDecryptQR: QRコードの解読用パスワードを入力
OptIn.OptInDoneStatus: オプトインが完了しました
OptIn.PendingAnotherSignaturesStatus: 他の連署人の署名を待っています
OptIn.ImportErrorAccountAlreadyImported: アカウントはすでにインポートされています
OptIn.ImportErrorMultisigAccountNotAllowed: マルチシグアカウントのオプトイン申請は、連署人のアカウントと一緒に発行しなければなりません。
OptIn.ImportErrorWrongOptedInAccount: このアカウントはすでにオプトイン済です。ただし、このウォレット内のSymbolアカウントではありません。正しいSymbolアカウントをインポートするか、別のXEMアカウント用のプライベートキーを使用してください。
OptIn.ErrorCreatingAccount: アカウントを作成できませんでした

harvest.title: ハーベスティング
harvest.blocksHarvested: ハーベストされたブロック

harvest.startHarvesting: ハーベスティング開始
harvest.harvetingIntroTitle: ブロック報酬を獲得するためハーベストを開始
harvest.minBalanceRequirement: 残高が不十分です。委任ハーベスティングを開始するには、アカウントに少なくとも%{balance}を保有している必要があります。
harvest.nonZeroImportanceRequirement: 重要度が0の場合、アカウントは委任された収穫を開始できません。重要度の再計算には最大12時間かかる場合があります.
harvest.viewLinkedKeys: リンクされたキーを表示

sidebar.removeAccountText: このアカウントをローカルストレージから削除してもよろしいですか？
sidebar.hideAccountDescription: このアカウントを非表示にしますか？ これはニーモニックシードアカウントであり、[アカウントの追加]ボタンを使用していつでも元に戻すことができます。 資金が失われることはありません。
sidebar.removeAccountDescription: このアカウントをウォレットから削除してもよろしいですか？これはニーモニックシードアカウントではありません。このアカウントの秘密鍵を持っていることを確認してください。そうしないとがアクセス出来なくなり資金を失ってしまいます。

settings.logoutConfirm2Desc: バックアップがないとウォレットに二度とアクセスすることはできなくなるかもしれません。ほんとうに、続行してもよろしいですか？

unsortedKeys.invalidPassword: パスワードが無効です！
unsortedKeys.invalidPrivateKeyQR: プライベートキーQRが無効です！
unsortedKeys.invalidPrivateKeyQROrPassword: プライベートキーQRまたはパスワードが無効です！
unsortedKeys.accountAddressQRInfo: これはSymbolアカウントアドレスのQRコードです。アカウント名は"%{accountName}"です。ドレスは"%{recipientAddress}"です。以下のアクションを選択してください。
unsortedKeys.invoiceTransactionQRInfo: これはトランザクション（請求書）QRコードです。%{amount} (%{mosaicName})を"%{recipientAddress}"に送金しますか？
unsortedKeys.accountPKQRInfo: これはアカウントプライベートキーQRコードです。[アカウントフォームを追加] に入力することで、このアカウントをウォレットに追加できます。
unsortedKeys.fileSavedToDirectoryMessage: ファイルは正常に保存されました。「%{folder}」フォルダを確認してください。
unsortedKeys.errorSavingFile: ファイルの保存中にエラーが発生しました
unsortedKeys.writePermissionsNeeded: ファイルの保存中にエラーが発生しました
unsortedKeys.invalidQRNetwork: QRコードは別のネットワークを参照しています。[設定] でノードを変更してもう一度お試しください。
unsortedKeys.unsupportedSymbolQR: このSymbol QRはまだサポートされていません。
unsortedKeys.failedToParseQR: QRの解析に失敗しました。
unsortedKeys.inavlidQRTransactionType: トランザクション種別はトランスファーではありません。
unsortedKeys.signedTransactionQRInfo: これは署名入りのトランザクションQRです。このトランザクションをネットワークに告知することができます。
